verses.verse: And you were dead<WG3498> in your trespasses<WG3900> and sins,<WG266>

in which<WG3739> you formerly<WG4218> walked<WG4043> according<WG2596> to the course<WG165> of this<WG3778> world,<WG2889> according<WG2596> to the prince<WG758> of the power<WG1849> of the air,<WG109> of the spirit<WG4151> that is now<WG3568> working<WG1754> in the sons<WG5207> of disobedience.<WG543>

Among<WG1722> them we too<WG2532> all<WG3956> formerly<WG4218> lived<WG390> in the lusts<WG1939> of our flesh,<WG4561> indulging<WG4160> the desires<WG2307> of the flesh<WG4561> and of the mind,<WG1271> and were by nature<WG5449> children<WG5043> of wrath,<WG3709> even<WG2532> as the rest.<WG3062>
But God,<WG2316> being<WG1510> rich<WG4145> in mercy,<WG1656> because<WG1223> of His great<WG4183> love<WG26> with which<WG3739> He loved<WG25> us,
even<WG2532> when we were dead<WG3498> in our transgressions,<WG3900> made<WG4806> us alive<WG4806> together<WG4806> with Christ<WG5547> (by grace<WG5485> you have been<WG1510> saved<WG4982>),
and raised<WG4891> us up with Him, and seated<WG4776> us with Him in the heavenly<WG2032> [places], in Christ<WG5547> Jesus,<WG2424>

in order<WG2443> that in the ages<WG165> to come<WG1904> He might show<WG1731> the surpassing<WG5235> riches<WG4149> of His grace<WG5485> in kindness<WG5544> toward<WG1909> us in Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>
For by grace<WG5485> you have been saved<WG4982> through<WG1223> faith;<WG4102> and that not of yourselves,<WG4771> [it is] the gift<WG1435> of God;<WG2316>
not as a result<WG1537> of works,<WG2041> that no<WG3361> one<WG5100> should boast.<WG2744>

For we are His workmanship,<WG4161> created<WG2936> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> for good<WG18> works,<WG2041> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> prepared<WG4282> beforehand,<WG4282> that we should walk<WG4043> in them.

Therefore<WG1352> remember,<WG3421> that formerly<WG4218> you, the Gentiles<WG1484> in the flesh,<WG4561> who are called<WG3004> "Uncircumcision<WG203>" by the so-called "Circumcision,<WG4061>" [which is] performed<WG5499> in the flesh<WG4561> by human<WG5499> hands<WG5499> â€“

[remember] that you were at that time<WG2540> separate<WG5565> from Christ,<WG5547> excluded<WG526> from the commonwealth<WG4174> of Israel,<WG2474> and strangers<WG3581> to the covenants<WG1242> of promise,<WG1860> having<WG2192> no<WG3361> hope<WG1680> and without<WG112> God<WG112> in the world.<WG2889>
But now<WG3570> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> you who<WG3739> formerly<WG4218> were far<WG3112> off<WG3112> have been<WG1096> brought<WG1096> near<WG1451> by the blood<WG129> of Christ.<WG5547>
For He Himself<WG846> is our peace,<WG1515> who made<WG4160> both<WG297> [groups into] one,<WG1520> and broke<WG3089> down<WG3089> the barrier<WG5418> of the dividing<WG3320> wall,<WG3320>

by abolishing<WG2673> in His flesh<WG4561> the enmity,<WG2189> [which is] the Law<WG3551> of commandments<WG1785> [contained] in ordinances,<WG1378> that in Himself<WG846> He might make<WG2936> the two<WG1417> into one<WG1520> new<WG2537> man,<WG444> [thus] establishing<WG4160> peace,<WG1515>
and might reconcile<WG604> them both<WG297> in one<WG1520> body<WG4983> to God<WG2316> through<WG1223> the cross,<WG4716> by it having put<WG615> to death<WG615> the enmity.<WG2189>
And He came<WG2064> and preached<WG2097> peace<WG1515> to you who<WG3588> were far<WG3112> away,<WG3112> and peace<WG1515> to those<WG3588> who were near;<WG1451>
for through<WG1223> Him we both<WG297> have<WG2192> our access<WG4318> in one<WG1520> Spirit<WG4151> to the Father.<WG3962>
So<WG686> then<WG686> you are no<WG3765> longer<WG3765> strangers<WG3581> and aliens,<WG3941> but you are fellow<WG4847> citizens<WG4847> with the saints,<WG40> and are of God's household,<WG3609>
having been built<WG2026> upon the foundation<WG2310> of the apostles<WG652> and prophets,<WG4396> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> Himself<WG846> being<WG1510> the corner<WG204> [stone],
in whom<WG3739> the whole<WG3956> building,<WG3619> being fitted<WG4883> together<WG4883> is growing<WG837> into a holy<WG40> temple<WG3485> in the Lord;<WG2962>
in whom<WG3739> you also<WG2532> are being built<WG4925> together<WG4925> into a dwelling<WG2732> of God<WG2316> in the Spirit.<WG4151>
